Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Southbound Reroute near Michigan/Delaware
ShortDescription: Southbound 3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via Columbus, Monroe and Michigan: due to, street blockage near Michigan/Delaware.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via Columbus, Monroe and Michigan: due to, street blockage near Michigan/Delaware.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
